response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your endeavors. After careful consideration of its value and potential impact on your business, I am offering this unique item for purchase at a special introductory price. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $1,200,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between the product's worth and your perceived value of it.

This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional chance to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price. Should you choose to accept, I assure you that the product will be delivered promptly and in perfect condition. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
